title: "Play Again" goes to Custom Game
body:
02/08/15 : Over the past couple of months, in the after game lobby, when I press "Play again" it takes me to the Custom game list instead of putting me in the queue for the game mode I was just playing. It's also happening to a couple of my friends.


EDIT 29/08/15: Bumping again because STILL no RED activity. This is meant to be help and support? Where's the support? Do your jobs!

And now this comment won't post cuz I'm "Commenting too quickly" ? What the actual FuK? >:(

replies.body:
Another bug that's been happening is when I go from Queue into champion select, I'm instantly blocked from chatting. So I have no chance to claim the lane I want. I didn't spam or use bad language beforehand so no reason for being blocked.
Again, this is happening to a couple of my friends as well.
